entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
